channel.title: | Project-Unique | 100% Uptime No Lagg
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/DmjFB5u.jpg[/img]
A PKing and Skilling sever with a 100% GUARENTEED Uptime
Are you looking for a server with perfect switches? Are you looking for a server with an active wilderness? Are you looking for a server with an active PVM and skilling community?
Then Project-Unique is the place for you.
Project-Unique is a new server which features a active wilderness, many bosses, active clans, and great skilling. It's gaining players everyday!
• 15+ Accounts are active on the forums daily. • 10+ People are online in game at any given time.
Project-Unique Features
•24/7 Active Pking, Skilling & PVM community. •Active Forums •Weekly updates •Excellent Staff •Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More! •Starter pack & Easy leveling •Stable economy •Special benefits for Donators (Such as Donator’s island) •Dragon Defender/Custom items •Every Chaotic/Pvp item •Pk point system
Why are we better than the rest?
•We care about our players •Unlike the other servers where the staff only care about their banks, the staff on Project-Unique care about their players •The numerous special events that are done every day to enhance our community •The intellectual discussions on the forums
Donator store with affordable prices: [img]http://i.imgur.com/rxDIfEc.png[/img]
Working simple Barrows: [img]http://i.imgur.com/9P4R0zb.png[/img]
Member Shop: [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZtP0DnV.png[/img]
A never ending Member Zone: [img]http://i.imgur.com/kesLWwg.png[/img]
100% Working Pest Control: [img]http://i.imgur.com/i5ZTmiZ.png[/img]
Desert Strykewyrms that drop Chaotics: [img]http://i.imgur.com/r3Bb8YA.png[/img]
Ice Strykewyrms that drop Staff Of Light: [img]http://i.imgur.com/c6HG6DQ.png[/img]
Premium Zone: [img]http://i.imgur.com/CQceuJl.png[/img]
Premium Shop: [img]http://i.imgur.com/qGjfP8R.png[/img]
100% Working Specs: [img]http://i.imgur.com/5SVTCmH.png[/img]
Tons of Custom Items: [img]http://i.imgur.com/4lmddex.png[/img]
Links: Webclient - [url=http://www.projectuniquersps.com/site/webclient]http://www.projectuniquersps.com/site/webclient[/url] Download client - [url=http://www.projectuniquersps.com/site/desktop]http://www.projectuniquersps.com/site/desktop[/url] Forums - [url=http://www.projectuniquersps.com/]http://www.projectuniquersps.com/[/url][/center]
